description: Single storey rear extension; single storey side extension (following demolition of existing side extension); alteration of rear roof with installation of two rooflights, replacement of roof tiles and additional rear roof extension (dormer) to rear roof slope
decision_conditions: The development to which this consent relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date on which the consent is granted.

Reason: To comply with the provisions of Section 18(1) of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990, as amended, to prevent the accumulation of unimplemented listed building consents and to enable the Local Planning Authority to review the situation at the end of this period if the development has not begun. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): 100-01 Rev 01 Location Plan, 120-01 Rev 01 Existing GA Plans 1 of 2, 120-02 Rev 01 Existing GA Plans 2 of 2, 120-03 Rev 01 Existing GA Elevations, 200-01 Rev 04 Proposed Site Plan, 300-01 Rev 05 Proposed GA Plans 1 of 2, 300-02 Rev 05 Proposed GA Plans 2 of 2, 360-01 Rev 05 Proposed GA Elevations, 370-01 Rev 03 Existing and Proposed GA Sections, Covering Letter prepared by Savills dated 18 December 2020, Design Statement prepared by Native North dated 18 December 2020, Heritage Impact Assessment prepared by Savills dated December 2020, Planning Statement prepared by Savills dated December 2020, Heritage Addendum prepared by Savills dated 25 February 2021.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | Notwithstanding the details shown on the plans and the application form, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policy D3 of the London Plan (2021). | The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall be Conservation Grade and shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B & 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013) and Policy D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021).
